get.description: Get list of all companies from the account.

parameters.name: statusFilter
parameters.description: Status filter. Possible values: 0 = Any, 1 = Active, -1 = Inactive, -2 = Pending

parameters.name: companyTypeFilter
parameters.description: Company type filter. Possible values: 0 = Any, ONLINE_PORTAL = Online-Portal only, CUSTOM_COMPANY = Custom company only

parameters.name: returnPortalRecords
parameters.description: Return portal records. Possible values: 0 = Not show portal records, 1 = Show portal records

get.description: Get list of all documents from the account.

parameters.name: companyFilter
parameters.description: Filter by company. Possible values: 0 = Any, -1 = unassigned or any companyUid from the /companies api response.

parameters.name: archivedFilter
parameters.description: Filter archived documents. Possible values: 0 = Only not archived, 1 = Any, 2 = Only archived

parameters.name: documentTypeFilter
parameters.description: Document type. Possible values: INCOMING_INVOICE / RECEIPT / PAYMENT_RECEIPT / EXPENSE_REIMBURSEMENT / SALES_INVOICE / CREDIT_NOTE / STATEMENT / DELIVERY_NOTE / ORDER_CONFIRMATION / PAYROLL / COMPANY_REGISTRATION_DOCUMENT / MISC / TRAVEL_EXPENSES / REMINDER

parameters.name: documentNumberFilter
parameters.description: Filter by document number.

parameters.name: noteFilter
parameters.description: Filter by note.

parameters.name: startDateFilter
parameters.description: Start document date filter

parameters.name: endDateFilter
parameters.description: End document date filter

parameters.name: documentUidExclusionFilter[]
parameters.description: Array of document Id that should not be in the results

parameters.name: documentUidStartFilter
parameters.description: document Id that can be used to limit result to only higher prim_uids

parameters.name: updatedOrNewSinceFilter
parameters.description: Limit result to documents modified or created after given date.

parameters.name: tagFilter[]
parameters.description: Filter by tag name.

parameters.name: paymentStatusFilter
parameters.description:
Filter by payment status. 
 Possible values:  paid / not_paid / unknown / all

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: If there are more documents than the 500 limit you can use this to get additional pages

400.description: Either request does not have any valid required parameters or invalid action.

403.description:
Invalid API key. Will validate API key for:
 * Key exists (code: 403)
 * Key is blocked or not (code: 407)
 * Daily limit is exceeded (code: 429)
 * Requests per minute limit is exceeded (code: 429)
 * You do not have required permission (code: 430)
 * Account is cancelled (code: 431)

415.description: Request content-type is not valid, should be application/json.

422.description:
Request could not be processed. Details will be provided within the response which also contains an unique error code for this API call.
 
 Possible failures:
 * An unexpected error occurred. (Failure code: 100) 
 * File type not supported. (Failure code: 101)
 * Required parameters not set. (Failure code: 102)
 * file_content: Wrong encoding. Must be base64 encoding. (Failure code: 103)
 * Hourly upload limit of 100 documents reached. (Failure code: 105)
 * Document already exists in account. (Failure code: 127)
 * Net amount must be numeric. (Failure code: 107)
 * Gross amount must be numeric. (Failure code: 108)
 * VAT must be numeric. (Failure code: 109)
 * VAT must be positive value. (Failure code: 110)
 * Invalid Date Format. Must be in format Y-m-d. (Failure code: 104)
 * Invalid payment status. (Failure code: 112)
 * Invalid company. (Failure code: 113)
 * Virus check failed. (Failure code: 132)
 * Invalid Due Date Format. Must be in format Y-m-d.. (Failure code: 137)
 * Invalid payment method. (Failure code: 138)
 * Invalid document type. (Failure code: 146)
 * File content or file url must be set. (Failure code: 141)

503.description: Temporary Issue. Please retry in a few minutes.

example.detail: Temporary Issue. Please retry in a few minutes.

post.description: Upload a new document to the account. Supported file types: pdf, eml

fileName.description: Name of the file with extension

companyId.description: ID of company from /companies

documentType.description: Document type. Possible values: INCOMING_INVOICE / RECEIPT / PAYMENT_RECEIPT / EXPENSE_REIMBURSEMENT / SALES_INVOICE / CREDIT_NOTE / STATEMENT / DELIVERY_NOTE / ORDER_CONFIRMATION / PAYROLL / COMPANY_REGISTRATION_DOCUMENT / MISC / TRAVEL_EXPENSES / REMINDER

paymentMethod.description: Document Payment Method. Possible values: bank_transfer, cash, check, direct_debit, credit, cc, paypal, online_payment, amazon_pay, apple_pay, google_pay, external_receivables_management, cashbox, offsetting, other

paymentStatus.description: Document Payment Status. Possible values: Unknown, Paid, Partially, Not paid

paidAt.description: Paid at date (format: Y-m-d), When payment_status = 'Paid'

vat.description:
VAT percentage. Array can be used for multiple tax rates.
Note: It will be deprecated soon. Either vat or taxRates can be used

runOCR.description: Use integrated OCR to fill optional params automatically

get.description: Get one document from the account.

parameters.name: loadLineItems
parameters.description: Set to true if you want to receive line items as well .

parameters.name: readableText
parameters.description: Set to true if you want to receive readable text from document.

parameters.name: includeDocument
parameters.description: Set to false if you want only basic data without the document content.

parameters.name: transactions
parameters.description: Set to false if you want only basic data without the connected transactions.

parameters.name: documentApproval
parameters.description: Set to false if you want only basic data without the connected workflow approval.

403.description:
Invalid API key. Will validate API key for:
 * Key exists (code: 403)
 * Key is blocked or not (code: 407)
 * Daily limit is exceeded (code: 429)
 * Requests per minute limit is exceeded (code: 429)
 * You do not have required permission (code: 430)
 * Account is cancelled (code: 431)

415.description: Request content-type is not valid, should be application/json.

422.description:
Request could not be processed. Details will be provided within the response which also contains an unique error code for this API call.
 
 Possible failures:
 * An unexpected error occurred. (Failure code: 100) 
 * Transaction Record Already Exists. (Failure code: 127) 
 * Bank Account not found (Failure code: 145) 
 * Invalid Bank Account Type (Failure code: 114) 
 * All OR One Required parameters not set. (Failure code: 102)

503.description: Temporary Issue. Please retry in a few minutes.

tags.name: Overview
tags.description:
GetMyInvoices API grants access to the account data from GetMyInvoices. It allows to query companies, list documents, get documents and upload documents. All access is restricted by API Key.

 Content-Type of all request should be application/json. 

 Parameters can be placed in request body, but also it can be placed in request url as query format.

tags.name: SDK
tags.description:
You can also see our official SDK for details how to use the API.
  • PHP: https://github.com/getmyinvoices/accounts-api-php

tags.name: Sample code
General Pointers
tags.description:
• HTTPS only: All requests are done over HTTPS.
  • UTF-8 encoding: All strings are sent and received in UTF-8.
  • JSON in, JSON out: Data is sent and received as JSON (although some endpoints might return binary documents).
  • Schemas: We're using the JSON schema format to document the endpoints.
  • ISO Date format: Dates are in ISO 8601 format: 2013-07-18
  • API Call Limit: 2500 API calls/day and 100 API calls/minute

attachments.description: Array of name and fileContent (base64 encoded)

paidAt.description: Paid at date (format: Y-m-d), When payment_status = 'Paid'
Paid at date (format: Y-m-d), When payment_status = 'Paid'

X-Application-Header.name: x-application
X-Application-Header.description: Optional header for providing document source. Set your application name here
